document.full_text: at 71, bestselling british author jeffrey archer is tackling his biggest project to date -- a five-novel saga called "the clifton chronicles" that sweeps through the 20th century and into the 21st.
document.title: bestseller jeffrey archer launches five-novel saga
lines_and_colors: at 71, bestselling british author jeffrey archer is tackling his biggest project to date -- a five-novel saga called "the clifton chronicles" that sweeps through the 20th century and into the 21st.
